${ModID}:PaceChaser.NAME: Pace Chaser

${ModID}:FrontRunner.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. Deal !D! damage X times, where X is the drawn card's cost. NL (0-cost and Unplayable count as 1.)
